Song.title: He Who Is Mighty
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Rebecca Elliott and Kate DeGraide © 2014 Sovereign Grace Praise (BMI)/Sovereign Grace Worship (ASCAP)

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [C#m] Oh, the [E2]mercy our [B]God has shown To [C#m]those who [E2]sit in death’s [B]shadow [C#m] The sun on [B/D#]high [E/G#]pierced the [A2]night [C#m]Born was the [Bsus B] Corner[E/G#] - st[F#m]one [E]
PRE-CHORUS: [A] Unto [B]us a [C#m7]Son is [B]given, [A] unto [B]us a [A/C#]Child is [B/D#]born
CHORUS: [E]He Who is mighty has [Esus]done a great [E]thing [C#m]Taken on flesh, [F#m/C#]conquered death’s [C#m]sting [B]Shattered the darkness and l[A]ifted our shame [C#m]Holy [A]is His[Bsus B] name
VERSE 2: [C#m] Oh, the fr[E2]eedom our [B]Savior won The [C#m]yoke of [E2]sin has been [B]broken [C3m] Once a [B/D#]slave, [E/G#]now by [A2]grace [C#m]No more [Bsus B]con - dem[E/G#]na [F#m]- [E]tion
BRIDGE: Now my [E]soul magni[Esus]fies the [E]Lord I re[A2]joice in the [Bsus]God Who [B]saves I will [E]trust His un[Esus]failing [E]love I will [A2]sing His praises [Bsus]all my d[A]ays
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 oh the mercy our god has shown to those who sit in deaths shadow the sun on high pierced the night born was the corner stone prechorus unto us a son is given unto us a child is born chorus he who is mighty has done a great thing taken on flesh conquered deaths sting shattered the darkness and lifted our shame holy is his name verse 2 oh the freedom our savior won the yoke of sin has been broken once a slave now by grace no more con demna tion bridge now my soul magnifies the lord i rejoice in the god who saves i will trust his unfailing love i will sing his praises all my days
